info.title: Cricket Scoring API
info.description:
A comprehensive REST API for cricket scoring and management system.

## Overview

This API provides complete functionality for cricket match management, including real-time scoring, player statistics, team management, and tournament organization.

## Features

### üîê Authentication & Authorization
JWT-based authentication with role-based access control

### üë• User Management
Complete user registration and profile management system

### üèè Teams & Players
Comprehensive team creation and player management with statistics

### üèüÔ∏è Venues & Tournaments
Venue management and tournament organization with scheduling

### üèè Match Management
Live match scoring with real-time updates and ball-by-ball tracking

### üìä Analytics & Reporting
Player performance analytics and detailed reporting tools

### üîî Notifications
Real-time notifications and event-based alerts

### üìÅ File Management
Secure file upload and document management system

### üîç Search & Dashboard
Global search functionality and dashboard analytics

## Basic Usage

### Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your_jwt_token>
```

### API Structure
The API follows REST conventions with proper HTTP methods:
- **GET** - Retrieve resources and data
- **POST** - Create new resources  
- **PUT** - Update existing resources
- **DELETE** - Remove resources

### Rate Limiting
- General endpoints: 100 requests per minute
- Authentication endpoints: 10 requests per minute
- File uploads: 5 requests per minute

For detailed endpoint information and examples, please refer to the individual endpoint documentation below.

get.description: Check the health status of the API
Welcome endpoint with API information

post.description:
Register a new user account in the Cricket Scoring System.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - New player registration for tournaments
    - Team member registration
    - Tournament organizer registration
    - Umpire/Scorer registration
    
    **Password Requirements:**
    - Minimum 8 characters
    - At least one uppercase letter
    - At least one lowercase letter
    - At least one digit
    
    **Role Assignment:**
    - PLAYER: Default role for new registrations
    - TEAM_CAPTAIN: Assigned by admin for team leaders
    - UMPIRE: For match officials
    - TOURNAMENT_ORGANIZER: For tournament management

schema.title: Response Register User Api V1 Register Post

example.detail: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter

post.description:
Authenticate user credentials and return JWT tokens for API access.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Player login for match participation
    - Admin login for system management
    - Umpire login for match officiating
    - Tournament organizer login for event management
    
    **Security Features:**
    - Rate limiting (10 requests per minute)
    - Account lockout after failed attempts
    - Secure token generation
    - Session management
    
    **Token Information:**
    - Access token: 30 minutes validity
    - Refresh token: 7 days validity
    - Bearer token format for API calls

example.detail: Account temporarily locked due to multiple failed attempts

post.description:
Generate a new access token using a valid refresh token.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Extend session without re-login
    - Maintain continuous API access
    - Automatic token renewal
    
    **Token Lifecycle:**
    - Access tokens expire in 30 minutes
    - Refresh tokens valid for 7 days
    - New access token issued on refresh
    - Refresh token remains unchanged
    
    **Security Features:**
    - Refresh token validation
    - Token blacklisting on logout
    - Automatic session extension

Initiate password reset process by sending reset email.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Forgotten password recovery
    - Account security enhancement
    - Automated password reset workflow
    
    **Process Flow:**
    1. Validates email existence
    2. Generates secure reset token
    3. Sends reset email with link
    4. Sets token expiration (1 hour)
    5. Logs reset request for security
    
    **Security Features:**
    - Time-limited reset tokens
    - One-time use tokens
    - Email verification required
    - Rate limiting protection

example.message: Password reset email sent to babar.azam@example.com

example.detail: Too many reset requests. Please try again later.

post.description:
Complete password reset using reset token from email.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Complete forgotten password recovery
    - Secure password change via email
    - Account recovery process
    
    **Process Steps:**
    1. Validates reset token
    2. Checks token expiration
    3. Verifies token not used
    4. Updates password securely
    5. Invalidates all existing sessions
    6. Sends confirmation email
    
    **Password Requirements:**
    - Minimum 8 characters
    - At least one uppercase letter
    - At least one lowercase letter
    - At least one digit

example.message: Password reset successful. Please login with your new password.

example.detail: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter

get.description:
Retrieve the current authenticated user's profile information.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Display user profile in dashboard
    - Show user information in app
    - Verify current user details
    - Profile management interface
    
    **Returned Information:**
    - User ID and basic details
    - Email and name
    - Current role and permissions
    - Team association (if any)
    - Account creation and update dates
    
    **Security:**
    - Requires valid authentication
    - Returns only own profile
    - No sensitive data exposure

put.description:
Update the current authenticated user's profile information.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Profile information updates
    - Name or contact changes
    - Profile picture updates
    - Account settings modification
    
    **Updateable Fields:**
    - Full name
    - Email address
    - Profile picture
    - Contact information
    - Preferences
    
    **Validation:**
    - Email uniqueness check
    - Name format validation
    - Data sanitization
    - Update timestamp tracking

post.description:
Change the current authenticated user's password.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Regular password updates
    - Security enhancement
    - Account protection
    - Compliance requirements
    
    **Security Features:**
    - Old password verification
    - New password validation
    - Password strength requirements
    - Session invalidation
    - Security notification
    
    **Password Requirements:**
    - Minimum 8 characters
    - At least one uppercase letter
    - At least one lowercase letter
    - At least one digit
    - Cannot be same as old password

example.message: Password changed successfully. Please login again.

example.detail: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter

get.description:
Retrieve list of all users in the system (admin only).
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Admin user management
    - System user overview
    - User analytics and reporting
    - Account administration
    
    **Features:**
    - Pagination support
    - Role-based filtering
    - Search capabilities
    - Sort options
    
    **Returned Data:**
    - User basic information
    - Role and permissions
    - Team associations
    - Account status
    - Creation dates
    
    **Security:**
    - Admin access only
    - No sensitive data exposure
    - Audit trail logging

delete.description:
Delete specific user account (admin only).
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Account termination
    - Data cleanup
    - Compliance requirements
    - System maintenance
    
    **Deletion Process:**
    - Soft delete (mark as inactive)
    - Preserve audit trail
    - Handle related data
    - Notification to user
    
    **Safety Measures:**
    - Confirmation required
    - Data backup
    - Audit logging
    - Recovery options
    
    **Impact Assessment:**
    - Team associations
    - Match participations
    - Analytics data
    - System dependencies

example.detail: Cannot delete user with active matches

post.description:
Logout the current user and invalidate their session.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - User session termination
    - Security logout
    - Account protection
    - Session cleanup
    
    **Security Features:**
    - Token blacklisting
    - Session invalidation
    - Audit trail logging
    - Security notification
    
    **Process:**
    1. Validates current user
    2. Blacklists access token
    3. Logs logout action
    4. Clears session data
    5. Returns success message

get.description:
Retrieve list of all teams with comprehensive filtering and pagination options.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Tournament team listing
    - Team management dashboard
    - Team selection interfaces
    - Analytics and reporting
    
    **Filtering Options:**
    - Search by team name (partial match)
    - Filter by active/inactive status
    - Pagination for large datasets
    - Sort by creation date
    
    **Returned Information:**
    - Team basic details
    - Player count and statistics
    - Performance metrics
    - Creation and update timestamps

post.description:
Create a new cricket team with comprehensive details.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Tournament team registration
    - League team creation
    - Club team setup
    - Professional team establishment
    
    **Required Permissions:**
    - TEAM_MANAGER role or higher
    - Admin access for system teams
    - Tournament organizer for event teams
    
    **Team Information:**
    - Full official name
    - Optional nickname for display
    - Team description and history
    - Logo and branding assets
    - Home ground information
    
    **Validation Rules:**
    - Team name must be unique
    - Valid logo URL format
    - Appropriate description length
    - Home ground validation

example.description: Professional cricket team from Karachi, established in 2016

    - Case-insensitive search

    - Active teams only
    - Team type filtering
    - Location-based search
    - Performance criteria
    
    **Returned Information:**

    - Performance metrics

post.description:
Create a new player in the cricket scoring system.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Team roster expansion
    - New player registration
    - Tournament player addition
    - Academy player promotion
    
    **Required Permissions:**
    - Team Management role or higher
    - Admin privileges for cross-team assignments
    
    **Validation Rules:**
    - Player name must be unique within the team
    - Date of birth must be valid
    - Role must be one of: BATSMAN, BOWLER, ALL_ROUNDER
    - Team ID must reference an existing team
    
    **Business Logic:**
    - Automatically assigns player ID
    - Sets creation timestamp
    - Validates team membership
    - Checks for duplicate names
    - Initializes player statistics

    - Player must exist and be active
    - Name changes must maintain uniqueness
    - Role changes trigger statistics recalculation
    - Team transfers require proper permissions
    
    **Business Logic:**
    - Updates only provided fields
    - Maintains audit trail
    - Triggers notification events
    - Updates related statistics

    - Tournament venue addition

    - Venue name must be unique
    - Location coordinates must be valid
    - Capacity must be positive number
    - Country and city must be provided

    - Automatically assigns venue ID

    - Validates geographic coordinates
    - Initializes venue statistics

Record a wicket with comprehensive dismissal details and statistics.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Wicket recording during live matches
    - Dismissal type tracking
    - Player statistics updates
    - Match progress monitoring
    
    **Required Permissions:**
    - Match Scoring role or higher
    - Active match participation
    
    **Validation Rules:**
    - Match must be in LIVE status
    - Dismissed batsman must be on strike
    - Bowler must be current bowler
    - Fielder required for certain dismissal types
    
    **Business Logic:**
    - Updates player statistics in real-time
    - Calculates bowling and batting averages
    - Triggers wicket notifications
    - Updates partnership records
    - Maintains dismissal history

post.description:
Upload files for cricket-related content.
    
    **Supported File Types:**
    - Images: JPG, PNG, GIF (player photos, team logos, venue images)
    - Documents: PDF, DOC, DOCX (match reports, tournament rules)
    - Videos: MP4, AVI, MOV (match highlights, player interviews)
    - Audio: MP3, WAV (commentary, interviews)
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Player profile pictures
    - Team logos and banners
    - Match highlights and videos
    - Tournament documents
    - Venue images and layouts
    
    **File Size Limits:**
    - Images: 5MB max
    - Documents: 10MB max
    - Videos: 100MB max
    - Audio: 20MB max

    - Admins can delete any file

    **Use Cases:**
    - Remove unwanted files
    - Clean up storage
    - File management
    - Content moderation

Upload a file with comprehensive metadata and access control options.

    - **DOCUMENTS**: PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX (max 25MB)
    - **AUDIO**: MP3, WAV, AAC (max 50MB)
    - **ARCHIVES**: ZIP, RAR (max 50MB)
    
    **Features:**
    - Automatic file type detection

    - Access control and permissions
    - File compression and optimization

Retrieve comprehensive audit logs with advanced filtering and pagination options.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Security monitoring and compliance
    - User activity tracking and analysis
    - System access monitoring
    - Regulatory compliance reporting
    - Incident investigation and forensics
    - Performance monitoring and optimization
    
    **Audit Categories:**
    - **User Actions**: Login, logout, profile updates, role changes
    - **Data Operations**: Create, read, update, delete operations
    - **System Events**: Configuration changes, maintenance activities
    - **Security Events**: Failed logins, unauthorized access attempts
    - **Business Operations**: Match scoring, team management, tournament updates
    
    **Filtering Options:**
    - **User ID**: Filter by specific user activities
    - **Action Type**: Filter by operation type (CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE, etc.)
    - **Resource Type**: Filter by entity type (user, team, match, etc.)
    - **Date Range**: Filter by specific time periods
    - **Pagination**: Control result size and offset
    
    **Features:**
    - Comprehensive audit trail
    - Real-time logging
    - Advanced filtering capabilities
    - Secure access control
    - Compliance reporting

schema.title: Response Get Audit Logs Api V1 Audit Logs Get

get.description:
Retrieve security-related audit events for threat monitoring and incident response.
    
    **Use Cases:**
    - Security incident monitoring and response
    - Threat detection and analysis
    - Unauthorized access tracking
    - Failed authentication monitoring
    - Security policy compliance
    - Incident investigation and forensics
    
    **Security Event Types:**
    - **Authentication Events**: Login attempts, logout, session management
    - **Authorization Events**: Permission changes, role modifications
    - **Access Control**: Unauthorized access attempts, privilege escalation
    - **Data Security**: Sensitive data access, data modification attempts
    - **System Security**: Configuration changes, security policy updates
    
    **Monitoring Features:**
    - Real-time security event detection
    - Failed login attempt tracking
    - Suspicious activity identification
    - IP address and location monitoring
    - User behavior analysis
